title: MyPhoto
description1: World War II (often abbreviated to WWII or WW2), also known as the Second World War, was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
additional1: World war is generally said to have begun on 1 September 1939, with the invasion of Poland by Germany...
welcome2: List of World War II weapons
description2: World War II saw rapid technological innovation in response to the needs of the various combatants. Many different weapons systems evolved as a result.
additional2: Note: This list does not consist of all weapons used by all countries in World War II.
